title: Log in to the Basic Authentication Site
preconditions: Customer has access to the Basic Authentication system
Browser has access to the internet
main_flow: Customer opens the browser and navigates to the Basic Authentication Site
Browser fetches the HTML content of the site
Browser processes the HTML content and looks for the login form
4. Customer enters their credentials (Username and Password)
5. Browser sends a request to the Basic Authentication System to validate the credentials
6. Basic Authentication System validates the credentials
7. If the credentials are valid, the Authorization System redirects the browser to the desired page
8. If the credentials are not valid, the browser displays the "Not Authorized" message
If the customer does not have a customer account, the customer attempts to create a new account
The customer follows the account creation process
If the account is successfully created, the customer logs in as usual
